Attacks.Name: Tri-Attack
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, this character gains power equal to the damage dealt. If a wild is rolled, roll a die: on 1-2 the target gains Burn, on 3-4 the target gains Freeze, on 5-6 the target gains Paralyze.

Attacks.Name: Drill Peck
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, Dodrio gains power equal to the damage dealt. If a wild is rolled, the target character gains the Stagger special condition.

Attacks.Name: Fury Attack
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled, Dodrio may make an additional Fury Attack without paying the cost. The additional attack must target the original character.

Attacks.Name: Jump Kick
Attacks.Effect: If this attack misses or is blocked, Dodrio suffers 2 damage.

Superpowers.Name: Run Away
Superpowers.Effect: This character may reroll all defense dice when targeted by an attack from a character that is within Range 2.

Superpowers.Name: Early Bird
Superpowers.Effect: If this character has the Sleep special condition, it wakes up at the start of its activation instead of the end.

Superpowers.Name: Agility
Superpowers.Effect: Dodrio may advance L after being targeted by an enemy attack. This superpower can be used only once per turn.

Attacks.Name: Tri-Attack (Enhanced)
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, this character gains power equal to the damage dealt. If a wild is rolled, roll a die: on 1-2 the target gains Burn, on 3-4 the target gains Freeze, on 5-6 the target gains Paralyze. Additionally, all enemy characters within range 1 of the target suffer 1 damage.

Superpowers.Name: Rage
Superpowers.Effect: When this character takes damage, it gains 1 power and adds 1 die to its next attack roll.
